description: Single pane of glass for most important Cassandra metrics

panels.description: Nodes that are currently running in this time window

targets.expr: count(count by(pod_name) (org_apache_cassandra_metrics_thread_pools_completed_tasks{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$host"} >= 0)) or vector(0)

panels.title: Nodes Up

panels.description: Nodes that are currently not running in this time window

targets.expr: count(absent(sum(rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_compaction_completed_tasks{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$host"}[1m:30s])))) OR vector(0)

panels.title: Nodes Down

panels.description: Number of connected clients during this time window

targets.expr: sum(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_connected_native_clients{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$host"})

panels.title: CQL Clients

panels.description: Rate of CQL requests during this window

targets.expr: sum(irate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_request_latency_count{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate]))

panels.title: CQL Requests / $rate

panels.description: Rate of Dropped requests during this window

targets.expr: sum(irate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_dropped_mutations{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate]))

panels.title: Dropped Messages / $rate

targets.expr: sum(irate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_tombstone_scanned_histogram_count{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate]))
sum(irate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_request_timeouts_total{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate]))
sum(irate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_storage_total_hints{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate]))

panels.description: Rate of compactions during this window

targets.expr: sum(rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_compaction_completed_tasks{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate]))

panels.title: Compactions / $rate

panels.description: Rate of compactions during this window

targets.expr: sum(rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_pending_compactions{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate]))

panels.title: Pending Compactions / $rate

targets.expr: sum(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_live_disk_space_used{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table", pod_name=~"$host"})

sum(rate(jvm_gc_g1_old_generation_time{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate])) + sum(rate(jvm_gc_g1_young_generation_time{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate]))
sum(irate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_request_latency_count{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate])) by ($by, request_type)
sum(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_connected_native_clients{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$host"}) by ($by)

histogram_quantile($latency, sum(rate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_client_request_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate])) by (le, request_type, $by))
sum(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_memtable_off_heap_size{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table", pod_name=~"$host"}) by ($by)
sum(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_memtable_on_heap_size{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table", pod_name=~"$host"}) by ($by)
sum(idelta(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_memtable_switch_count{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate])) by ($by)
sum(idelta(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_pending_flushes{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate])) by ($by)

sum(irate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_compaction_bytes_written{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate])) by ($by)
sum(irate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_pending_compactions{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate])) by ($by)
sum(irate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_compaction_completed_tasks{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate])) by ($by)

histogram_quantile($latency, sum(irate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_range_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate])) by (le, $by))

histogram_quantile($latency, sum(irate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_read_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate])) by (le, $by))

histogram_quantile($latency, sum(irate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_write_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate])) by (le, $by))

histogram_quantile($latency, sum(irate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_coordinator_read_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table"}[$rate])) by (le, $by))

histogram_quantile($latency, sum(irate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_coordinator_scan_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate])) by (le, $by))

histogram_quantile($latency, sum(irate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_table_coordinator_write_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate])) by (le, $by))
sum(irate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_streaming_total_incoming_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate])) by ($by)
sum(irate(org_apache_cassandra_metrics_streaming_total_outgoing_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", datacenter=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", pod_name=~"$host"}[$rate])) by ($by)

title: Cassandra Cluster Condensed
